main event: A witness spotted a round or oval object with lights in the sky that appeared to be maneuvering and hovering for approximately 5 hours.
interesting points: The object was described as being about 25-30 feet in diameter and having colored lights on it.
The object appeared to stop and hover at one point.
After approximately 5 hours, the object moved off to the north.
No positive identification could be made as to the nature of this object.
Other witnesses also observed the object in the sky.
sighted object: round or oval object with lights
